title: Oz
description: Raised by the Cuban Cartel, Nicho Ozel will use everything in his arsenal to stay alive. Even if it means abducting the incredibly enticing sister of his most hated enemy. Wanted by the mob and running from the deadly Incola Virus, Oz turns to the only family he has left...The Bracadytes.Taken hostage by her most hated enemy, Maria fights Oz at every turn. Until he one night on the open water, he risks his life to save hers, forcing Maria to choose between the need for revenge and her heart's strongest desire...
author: Ditter Kellen
